int tabwidth
 distance in pixels from the menu border to the left of the item.

Detailed Description

Scroll bar game menu item class.

This class implements a scroll bar menu item useful for editing numeric values. It can be combined with a value display menu item for displaying a number and editing it with the scroll bar.
